DOC.brief_summary: A study measure utility indwell bladder catheter placement orthopaedic surgical patient receive spinal anesthesia . Study track clinical outcome , patient satisfaction cost efficacy . Absence indwell bladder catheter may decrease urinary tract infection ( UTI ) incidence , increase patient satisfaction , decrease cost burden without increase postoperative urinary retention ( POUR ) incidence .
DOC.brief_title: Utility Indwelling Catheter Orthopaedic Patients Receiving Spinal Anesthesia
DOC.criteria: Elective orthopaedic surgical patient age undergo low extremity adult reconstructive surgery spinal anesthesia interview . Patients exclude study preoperatively history prostate urological surgery , renal failure , previous document POUR , current indwelling catheter , acute UTI .
